spare_messages.not_ready: The Ancient Guardian ignores your words, eyes blazing with fury.
spare_messages.wavering: The Guardian hesitates... its attacks seem less fierce.
spare_messages.ready: The Guardian's light dims. It lowers its weapon, ancient sorrow in its eyes.
spare_messages.spared: The Ancient Guardian kneels. 'You have shown mercy where none was expected. Go in peace.'
